frontMatter.title: Club Night
frontMatter.summary: Join us tonight from 8pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium. All skill levels are welcome; we have 4 courts ready for you!

prev.title: Shuttle Time!
prev.summary: Join us at Claremont Stadium for some shuttle action! All ages welcome. Sign up by Friday, 20th September to join a team. Juvenile Club returns tonight!

next.title: Join Us at Claremont Stadium for a New Badminton Season!
next.summary: The new badminton season is almost here! Join us at Claremont Stadium for some exciting games. Whether you're a pro or a beginner, there's space for everyone. Don't miss out!
